attributes.action: re-open the railway line between Colne (Lancashire) to Skipton (N.Yorkshire)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If this line was re-opened there would be a direct link to Manchester and Preston, thereby potentially removing hundreds of cars from the roads.This 11.5 mile line was closed in the 1970s.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "re-open the railway line between Colne (Lancashire) to Skipton (N.Yorkshire)."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20298


Prime Minister's Office
